name: Luminaries of the Word
description:
Luminaries of the Word is an educational game aimed at bringing forth the work done by Bengali women like Begum Rokeya Sakhawat Hossain, Kamini Roy, Sufia Kamal and Romena Afaz. This game discusses a few poems and books written by these women. Everything is available in English, so anyone can join the protagonist as they move forward to traverse the lives of these women.

The game contains a few dialogues that discuss the happenings of the War of Liberation of Bangladesh. Thus, the game is not for anyone under the age of 17.
